segments.text: I see the water just keeps on flowing, creating a bigger and bigger puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting to think about the mess that water is making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is still polishing that plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is making me nervous, he's really pushing his luck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just as guilty, encouraging him to take those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so inviting, I wish I could just step out and enjoy it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing the water damage that's happening to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel is bunched up around the plate, it's like she's in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice the overflow before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is just a recipe for disaster, it's frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
